ai.summary: GM Ringway Stage 19 is a 24.6 km hard hike in the UK along the GM Ringway. Expect steep climbs, rugged terrain, and a full day on the trails with variable weather.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain with steep ascents and descents, rocky paths, boggy sections, woodland, and occasional open moorland. Some sections may involve road or field paths and water crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for a long day (6–10 hours). Check the weather forecast and be prepared for sudden changes common in the UK. Navigation can be challenging in remote stretches; carry a map and compass (GPS as backup). Wear sturdy boots and dress in layers; carry a waterproof jacket and extra warm layer. Inform someone of your planned route and estimated finish time. Bring sufficient food and water, and have a small first aid kit and a whistle.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots with good ankle support
Map and compass (and GPS as backup)
Fully charged phone and power bank
Water bottles or a hydration system (2–3 L)
High-energy snacks and a light meal
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn (roughly May–September).

seo.title: GM Ringway Stage 19 – 24.6 km Hard Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore GM Ringway Stage 19: a 24.6 km hard hike across varied UK terrain. Plan for a full day with steep sections, rugged trails, and unpredictable weather.
